text.1: Combines the capabilities of storing, exchanging, trading, and managing digital assets, including cryptocurrencies, NFTs, and fiat currencies.
text.2: This wallet is designed for the convenience of both novice users and experienced crypto enthusiasts, offering all the necessary tools in one application.

1.title: Universal Asset Storage
list: Securely store your cryptocurrencies — from Bitcoin and Ethereum to Solana and beyond.
Keep your NFTs safe, whether ERC-721, ERC-1155, TRC-20, or other token standards.
Seamlessly connect fiat currencies (USD, EUR, RUB, and more) through linked cards and bank accounts.

2.title: Best-Rate Exchange
list: Automatically get the most profitable exchange rates for crypto and fiat.
Enjoy instant cross-chain swaps between multiple blockchains without hassle.

3.title: NFT Management Made Easy
list: Store, view, and transfer your NFTs in one place.
Trade directly on leading NFT marketplaces with built-in integration.
Easily access metadata and media linked to your NFTs.

4.title: Flexible Wallet Options
list: Create new wallets on Ethereum, BNB Chain, Solana, and more — in just a few clicks.
Import existing wallets via private keys, seed phrases, or hardware devices like Ledger and Trezor.

5.title: Next-Level Security
list: Multi-layered protection with 2FA, biometrics, and advanced encryption.
Optional multisignature wallets for maximum safety and peace of mind.

6.title: Fiat Integration
list: Top up and withdraw funds easily via bank cards and accounts.
Low-fee transfers between fiat and crypto anytime, anywhere.

7.title: Cross-Platform Access
list: Use DeFiBridge on iOS, Android, Windows, macOS, or directly in your browser.
Stay synced across all your devices effortlessly.

8.title: Full DeFi Support
list: Connect to leading dApps and DeFi protocols with ease.
Participate in staking, farming, and other DeFi opportunities directly.

9.title: User-Friendly Interface
list: Clean, intuitive design with customizable dashboards.
Dark/light themes and multilingual support for a truly global experience.
